Description: Rim sherd of Chian, probably black-figured, pottery kantharos; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below, with two added red bands; exterior: reserved band at rim; below, broad black band; on left, part of black handle zone; trace of decoration in panel; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels, see Lemos no. 1625 from Emporio.
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 42)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 699, no. 564)
Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 333, no. 1629, pl. 212, no. 1629)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1893) (phase 2)
